alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Comal; Gonzales; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 11:35PM CDT until April 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Caldwell County in south central Texas... Guadalupe County in south central Texas... Northwestern Gonzales County in south central Texas... Southeastern Comal County in south central Texas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1134 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over McQueeney, or near New Braunfels, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, Schertz, Seguin, Cibolo, Luling, McQueeney, Marion, Kingsbury, Santa Clara, New Berlin, Staples, Zuehl, Fentress, Geronimo, Zorn, Nolte, Zipp, Stairtown, Belmont, and Freiheit. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
